content: Tom ha detto che non voleva parlare di Mary.
translations: eng:Tom said he didn't to want to talk about Mary
eng:Tom said he didn't want to talk about Mary
eng:Tom said that he didn't to want to talk about Mary
eng:Tom said that he didn't want to talk about Mary
